data.message: I'm still waiting for a day to actually come, when one of you actually moves, as you all say you would, but never do! It's so annoying to be following you for your music and you get politically hateful every chance you get. Just be a man of your word already and move! Talking BS is definitely easier. Unfollowed.👎

replies.message: Dont no body miss you. Gtfo.
If he was for Trump, you wouldn't care. Now that's he speaking out about him, you care.
Remember when he said fuck bush and Cheney? Did you hate on Em back then aswell?

Most celebrity scum like him, katy perry , skankette Miley Cyrus and countless other celebitutes have claimed or said they would move to canada if Trump won.  They are all liars, and have proven they are all talk and no action when it comes to that.  It's okay I have saved so much money by not supporting them, buying their albums, or seeing their movies.      Olga Ka you are right on the money!
I've always hated Eminem. Now I just hate him more.
